channel.title: Bleed With Me (My Poem)
channel.description:
Bleed with me Hold me tightly Please don't let this be Our final glance Of eternity I really care On what you say Other than The other way I don't want to see you cry Neither see you die I would take a bullet for you And lie bleeding as I meant to To get one final glimpse of your eyes I try, I try And as I lay dying As I draw my last breath I clutch your hands Hoping for one last caress Then I whisper softly "Bleed with me" She stifles a sob and holds back those tears And screams at the sky for losing the person once dear And tries so hard not to die of fear And even screams as death comes near She finds a gun on the ground and realizes one way There's only this to stifle the pain She closes her eyes, and remembers my name As she clutches the gun she screams in vain As the gunshot rings throughout the street And as the blood pools at our feet She smiles sweetly Dies discreetly Knowing she did see She kept her promise To bleed with me As we spend eternity Whispering sweetly Caressing each other as we fly neatly To the Heavens that will share our love
Bleed With Me
Hope you like it

item.title: Bleed With Me (My Poem)

item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

That comes under cliché and terrible attempt at writing.

Read full topic

item.title: Bleed With Me (My Poem)
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote="_Vengeance, post:18, topic:270837"]Bleed with me
Hold me tightly
Please don’t let this be
Our final glance
Of eternity
Cliché, the breaks in the lines were needless and destroyed any hope of flow.
I really care
On what you say
What? This makes no sense.
Other than
The other way
What? This makes no sense.
I don’t want to see you cry
Neither see you die
I would take a bullet for you
And lie bleeding as I meant to
To get one final glimpse of your eyes
Cliché.
I try, I try
And as I lay dying
As I draw my last breath
Cliché.
I clutch your hands
Hoping for one last caress
Cliché.
Then I whisper softly
“Bleed with me”
She stifles a sob and holds back those tears
And screams at the sky for losing the person once dear
Random change of viewpoint? Do not do this.
And tries so hard not to die of fear
And even screams as death comes near
Absolutely forced rhyming.
She finds a gun on the ground and realizes one way
There’s only this to stifle the pain
What? This makes no sense.
She closes her eyes, and remembers my name
As she clutches the gun she screams in vain
What? This makes no sense. She screams in vain… As she kills herself? Screaming does not stop people killing themselves
As the gunshot rings throughout the street
And as the blood pools at our feet
Terrible flow.
She smiles sweetly
Dies discreetly
Knowing she did see
Absolutely forced rhyming.
She kept her promise
To bleed with me
As we spend eternity
Whispering sweetly
Caressing each other as we fly neatly
Absolutely forced rhyming.
To the Heavens that will share our love
Cliché.

Bleed With Me

All in all a terrible attempt at poetry. Cliché themes, no real depth, many redundant or nonsensical lines, horrible flow, forced rhyming, inconsistencies in viewpoint and overall just a terrible attempt at writing.[/quote]You forgot emo.

Read full topic

Random change of viewpoint? Do not do this.

What? This makes no sense. She screams in vain… As she kills herself? Screaming does not stop people killing themselves

Absolutely forced rhyming.

Cliché.

Bleed With Me

All in all a terrible attempt at poetry. Cliché themes, no real depth, many redundant or nonsensical lines, horrible flow, forced rhyming, inconsistencies in viewpoint and overall just a terrible attempt at writing.

item.title: Bleed With Me (My Poem)
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

Bleed with me
Hold me tightly
Please don’t let this be
Our final glance
Of eternity
I really care
On what you say
Other than
The other way
I don’t want to see you cry
Neither see you die
I would take a bullet for you
And lie bleeding as I meant to
To get one final glimpse of your eyes
I try, I try
And as I lay dying
As I draw my last breath
I clutch your hands
Hoping for one last caress
Then I whisper softly
“Bleed with me”
She stifles a sob and holds back those tears
And screams at the sky for losing the person once dear
And tries so hard not to die of fear
And even screams as death comes near
She finds a gun on the ground and realizes one way
There’s only this to stifle the pain
She closes her eyes, and remembers my name
As she clutches the gun she screams in vain
As the gunshot rings throughout the street
And as the blood pools at our feet
She smiles sweetly
Dies discreetly
Knowing she did see
She kept her promise
To bleed with me
As we spend eternity
Whispering sweetly
Caressing each other as we fly neatly
To the Heavens that will share our love

Bleed With Me

Hope you like it

Read full topic
